trends: There has been one other sighting in Hallsville
There were no other sightings in Hallsville on or around January 8th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsthere were two orange lights flying north to south when they went out of sight a very big red light came into view flying behind them when it got out of sight another very big red light did the same thing it looked like it stopped at one point then went out of sight i have lived here for 4 years and i have never seen anything like that
Summary: two orange lights right behind each other then two red lights behind them
